post_title: T206 McQuillen Batting Piedmont 42 Top Pop SGC 5-RARE!
post_content:
Offered is a 1909-11 T206 White Borders card featuring George McQuillan's With Bat card with a "Piedmont - 350-460 Subjects" ad with a very scarce and rare factory 42 back.  

Graded SGC EX 5. Will offer at $1450 F&F including priority shipping
Add 3% for G&S

This is the one and only card graded EX with none others graded higher for this brand/series/factory at SGC or PSA

The top pop PSA card sold this past April at Heritage for $1,500 and IMO this copy presents better on centering, corners and has deeper coloring

[url]https://sports.ha.com/itm/baseball-cards/singles-pre-1930-/1909-11-t206-piedmont-350-460-42-george-mcquillan-with-bat-psa-ex-5-pop-one-none-higher-for-this-brand-series-factory/a/50053-53300.s?type=DA-DMC-VCP-Sports-50053-04142022[/url]

Thanks and Happy Holidays!
Wayne
